resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206201</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ComPADRE: Resources for Physics and Astronomy Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ComPADRE: Betriebsmittel für Physik-und 
Astronomie-Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ComPADRE : Ressources pour l'éducation de 
physique et d'astronomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ComPADRE: Recursos para a instrução da 
física e da astronomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ComPADRE: Risorse per formazione di 
astronomia e di fisica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ComPADRE: Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για την 
εκπαίδευση φυσικής και αστρονομίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ComPADRE: Recursos para la educación de la 
física y de la astronomía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides reviewed collections of resources and interactive learning environments for teaching physics and astronomy. Topics include motion, forces, energy, heat, wave energy, electrostatics, circuits, magnetism, particles, asteroids, dark matter, cool stars, big bang theory, robotic exploration of space, and many more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt wiederholte Ansammlungen Betriebsmittel und
interaktive erlernenumgebungen für unterrichtende Physik und 
Astronomie zur Verfügung. Themen enthalten Bewegung, Kräfte, 
Energie, Hitze, Welle Energie, Electrostatics, Stromkreise, 
Magnetismus, Partikel, Planetoide, dunklen Stoff, kühle Sterne, 
grosse Knalltheorie, Robotererforschung des Platzes und viel mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit les collections passées en revue de 
ressources et d'environnements d'étude interactifs pour la physique 
et l'astronomie d'enseignement. Les sujets incluent le 
mouvement, forces, énergie, la chaleur, énergie de vague, 
electrostatics, circuits, magnétisme, particules, asteroïdes, 
matière foncée, fraîche tient le premier rôle, grande théorie de coup, 
exploration robotique de l'espace, et beaucoup plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece coleções revistas dos recursos e de 
ambientes de aprendizagem interativos para a física e a astronomia 
ensinando. Os tópicos incluem o movimento, as forças, a 
energia, o calor, a energia da onda, o electrostatics, os circuitos, o
magnetismo, as partículas, os asteroids, a matéria escura, estrelas 
frescas, a teoria grande do estrondo, a exploração robotic do 
espaço, e o muito mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le collezioni riviste di risorse e di 
ambienti imparanti interattivi per la fisica e l'astronomia 
d'istruzione. I soggetti includono il movimento, le forze, 
l'energia, il calore, l'energia dell'onda, il electrostatics, i 
circuiti, il magnetismo, le particelle, gli asteroidi, la materia 
scura, le stelle fredde, la teoria grande di scoppio, l'esplorazione 
robot di spazio e molto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις αναθεωρημένες συλλογές των στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς και των διαλογικών μαθησιακών περιβαλλόντων για τη 
φυσική και την αστρονομία διδασκαλίας. Τα θέματα 
περιλαμβάνουν την κίνηση, τις δυνάμεις, την ενέργεια, τη 
θερμότητα, την ενέργεια κυμάτων, electrostatics, τα κυκλώματα, 
το μαγνητισμό, τα μόρια, asteroids, το σκοτεινό θέμα, τα 
δροσερά αστέρια, τη θεωρία μεγάλου κτυπήματος, τη ρομποτική 
εξερεύνηση του διαστήματος, και πολύ περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a colecciones repasadas de recursos y 
de ambientes que aprenden interactivos para la física y la 
astronomía de enseñanza. Los asuntos incluyen el movimiento, 
fuerzas, energía, calor, energía de la onda, electrostática, los 
circuitos, magnetismo, partículas, los asteroides, la materia oscura,
las estrellas frescas, teoría grande de la explosión, la 
exploración robótica del espacio, y muchos más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206201</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106253</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/compadre-resources-for-physics-and-astronomy-education</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
